raw_comment:
1. What do you notice? 

I  notice that across the board, young men are less likely to reach out to a parent as compared to young women.

2. What do you wonder?

I wonder why men are less likely to reach out than women, and what the age range of respondents is.

3. What impact does this have on you and your community?

This has a great impact on me and my community as we all have relationships with our parents

4. What's going on in this graph? 

Got mail? Communicating with parents
ace_sentences: The graph is about communicating with parents.
Young men are less likely to reach out to a parent than young women.
I wonder why men are less likely to reach out to a parent than women.
I wonder what the age range of the respondents is.
This situation has a great impact on me.
This situation has a great impact on my community.
People in my community have relationships with their parents.
I have a relationship with my parents.
The headline is: Got mail? Communicating with parents.
